attributes.name: Study Note
attributes.summary: A comprehensive card system for organizing study notes with markdown support, subject categorization, and tagging functionality. Perfect for students, educators, and lifelong learners.

cardInfo.notes: Ideal for computer science students, algorithm study, and technical concept documentation
cardInfo.title: Study Note
cardInfo.description: Create and organize study notes with structured content, subject classification, and searchable tags. Features markdown support for rich formatting and timestamp tracking for study progress.
